title: game is fucked session expired
body: get "session expired please relog in" in aram champ select, game then closes causing 15 minute queue ban. People are leaving champ select 10x more than usual right now so I suspect this isn't just me, gf is also getting the same issue

replies.body: same problem. randomly get session has expire please re log at least once an hour. also happened once during lobby which causes me leave buster and loss of lp.
Same problem. Game kicks me while playing, saying "session expired" and then gives me a 15 minute queue penalty because it thinks i dodged..
same problem. happens about every 10 minutes cannot play the game or get into queue at all
same problem from today every 10-15 minutes and after evey game
same problem. probably for the entire 2 week now every time I logging in to my account. Even though I got a great connection
